summary: Completed implementation of missing pages and design alignment for Beauty Booking module. Created 8 new view files: admin/salon/new-requests.blade.php, admin/salon/new-requests-details.blade.php, admin/salon/bulk-import.blade.php, admin/salon/bulk-export.blade.php, admin/settings/home-page-setup.blade.php, admin/business-settings/email-format-setting/index.blade.php, vendor/review/list.blade.php, vendor/settings/settings.blade.php. Updated routes in admin/admin.php and vendor/routes.php. Added controller methods: BeautySalonController (admin) - newRequests, newRequestsDetails, approveOrDeny, bulkImportIndex, bulkImportData, bulkExportIndex, bulkExportData; BeautySalonController (vendor) - settings, updateSettings; Created BeautyReviewController (vendor) - list, reply, export; Created BeautySettingsController (admin) - homePageSetup, homePageSetupUpdate, emailFormatSetting. Aligned key pages (salon/index, category/index, booking/index, staff/index, service/index, booking/index vendor) with Rental module design patterns including consistent page headers, card structures, search forms, and export buttons.
current_status: All planned tasks completed. Missing pages created and integrated. Design alignment completed for key pages following Rental module patterns. Routes and controllers updated. Remaining: Additional pages can be aligned incrementally using established patterns. Email format settings and home page setup have basic structure and can be expanded with full functionality as needed.
